item.description:
Learn all about the Enneagram subtleties both within and between types beyond the basics, as well as how to develop each of the nine types in yourself. Herb will review the 9 Enneagram types in the beginning of the workshop to lay the groundwork for this advanced workshop. Herb presents the Enneagram in an entertaining and informative style â€“ easily accessible to those who are just learning as well as those who have worked with the Enneagram before.

For more info, call 508 752 3766 ext 19.
at All Saints Church
10 Irving St. MA
508 752 3766, kairoscenter@allsaintsw.org
To register: Send a check for $25 to to Kairos Spiritual Life Center, All Saints Church, 10 Irving St., Worcester, MA 01609

9am to 12:30

$25

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert with over 20 years experience teaching personality types workshops He is a relationship therapist and coach, working with individuals, couples and families, leads trainings in organizations and gives presentations and workshops throughout the world.

www.herbpearce.com (workshop schedule) and to sign up for his newsletter
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Advanced Enneagram Workshop in Worcester
